EmailTemplate.name: Connectivity Web Portal Rqst Info HON
EmailTemplate.subject: Cabin Connectivity Access Request {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName}, Thank you for requesting access to Cabin Connectivity for {!Case.Description}.
Please let us know what type of access you require. Will you be doing Customer demos requiring access to all Customer aircraft or do you need access to view Honeywell aircraft? If you need access to a Honeywell account, please provide the registration numbers which you would like to view.
If you have any questions or need further assistance, please reply to fssaccounts@honeywell.com. Please include your {!Case.CaseNumber} when sending your reply.
Thank you and regards,
{!Case.OwnerFullName}
Honeywell | Aerospace
GoDirect Services
email: fssaccounts@honeywell.com
https://myaerospace.honeywell.com/
